text:
- So Infor is one of the
industry leading cloud vendors

that really builds
industry-specific solutions.

So when we talk about
industry-specific solutions,
we're talking about micro verticals,

specifically building
prescriptive implementations
for our customers,

to allow them to go to
market quickly and easily.
So one of the things that we noticed

as we started to look at this
journey towards the cloud

is that we needed to really
have a platform that scales up.
We service a lot of different industries,
and we really looked to AWS
to look at that technology platform

for us to deliver our solutions
a lot quicker and faster,

but also take some of the
technology innovations
that AWS provides.

We've used almost everything
to really build our platform,

whether when it comes to
DynamoDB for our data lake,
SageMaker for AI,
what it's really allowed us to do

is also work and evolve
these services with AWS.
So our R and D team at Infor

works very closely with
the R and D team at AWS.
And as we adopt these services,
we've also evolved these services
to provide that value to our customers.

And it's also allowed us really
to go to market a lot faster
with our customers, really leveraging

and having that platform that
allows our applications team

to deliver these industry
solutions that we want

for our customers across
the globe, actually.
